entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 10. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 70 percent chance of light snow this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 11. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 70 percent chance of light snow changing to 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 11. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022
